meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a crunode.
meanings.sent1: The crunodal pattern on the fabric was unique and eye-catching.

meanings.sent5: The crunodal color of the flower made it a favorite in the garden.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to a crunode.
